item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Colocation: Non-Clown Hosting (80 points | 48 comments)

3. In 1870, Lord Rayleigh used oil and water to calculate the size of molecules (303 points | 101 comments)
4. America's oldest tombstone came from Belgium and belonged to an English knight (4 points | discuss)

13. Perfect prevention vs. perfect detection (27 points | 3 comments)
14. Tracy: A real time, nanosecond resolution frame profiler (15 points | discuss)
15. Free-form floor plan design using differentiable Voronoi diagram (178 points | 34 comments)

26. Picking Glibc Versions at Runtime (73 points | 26 comments)
27. The Environmental Toll of a Single ChatGPT Query Is Absolutely Wild (5 points | 3 comments)
28. Active Ball Joint Mechanism with Three-DoF Based on Spherical Gear Meshings (8 points | 1 comment)
29. What I've Learned in the Past Year Spent Building an AI Video Editor (28 points | 6 comments)
